body: Hi Mostapha, Yes, I always use selectSkyMtx, just don't set the time boundaries. I've set them just to check and got results that are even more confusing. Now direct solar radiation doesn't show any value and legend values are too small. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/0fabN7lSqciYmkqjdlmV*rmVp1rIWwfWlzT3AJ4*9YekEd6J4jwLbBFSsWZStGd-fSKWGZBsUF8-jC-BrQc3VnoVP5iW3vQ8/SkyDomeForSummer.jpg)
